title: Applicability of claims settlement provisions to
context: ยง431:15-322 Applicability of claims settlement provisions to loss claims. Section 431:15-310(a)(18), section 431:15-325 through section 431:15-328, section 431:15-333, section 431:15-403&copy;, section 431:15-406, and section 431:15-407 do not apply to loss claims to the extent that they are subject to article 16 or to corresponding laws of other states. [L 1987, c 347, pt of ยง2]
